comments: Fontecchio (DET) establishes himself in Adebayo's (MIA) path and does not deliver illegal contact.
Duren (DET) is firming up over his right leg and absorbs the contact from Butler (MIA) to his upper body.
Butler (MIA) legally contests Fontecchio's (DET) jump shot attempt.
Butler (MIA) briefly grasps Fontecchio's (DET) right arm as they engage for off-ball positioning, and the contact is marginal.
Fontecchio (DET) cleanly deflects the ball away from Butler (MIA).

call_type: Turnover:  Out of Bounds - Bad Pass Turn
comments: Rozier (MIA) is the last player to touch the ball before the ball goes out of bounds.  Possession is correctly awarded to the Pistons.
Fontecchio (DET) is the last player to touch the ball before the ball goes out of bounds.  Possession is correctly awarded to the Heat.
Fontecchio (DET) is already in Adebayo's (MIA) path when contact occurs and he does not deliver contact.
Rozier (MIA) legally contests Fontecchio's (DET) jump shot attempt.
Fontecchio (DET) is moving alongside Butler's (MIA) path and marginal contact occurs during the driving shot attempt.
Butler (MIA) is the last player to touch the ball before the ball goes out of bounds.  Possession is correctly awarded to the Pistons.
Rozier (MIA) and Fontecchio (DET) briefly engage and disengage off-ball.
Duren (DET) establishes himself in Rozier's (MIA) path and does not deliver illegal contact.
Rozier (MIA) legally contests Fontecchio's (DET) jump shot attempt.
Fontecchio (DET) legally contests Butler's (MIA) jump shot, making "high-five" contact after the ball is released.
Fontecchio (DET) commits a take foul on Butler (MIA).
Stewart (DET) commits a take foul on Butler (MIA).
Robinson (MIA) legally contests Fournier's (DET) jump shot attempt.
